scripts.build:and:alpha: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=alpha ENVFILE=.env.alpha APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-Alpha-1 bundle exec fastlane android build
scripts.build:and:beta: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=beta ENVFILE=.env.beta APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-Beta-1 bundle exec fastlane android build
scripts.build:and:production: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=production ENVFILE=.env.production APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-1  bundle exec fastlane android build
scripts.build:ios:alpha: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=alpha ENVFILE=.env.alpha APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-Alpha bundle exec fastlane ios build
scripts.build:ios:beta: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=beta ENVFILE=.env.beta APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-Beta bundle exec fastlane ios build
scripts.build:ios:production: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=production ENVFILE=.env.production APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate bundle exec fastlane ios build
scripts.deploy:and:alpha: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=alpha ENVFILE=.env.alpha APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-Alpha-1 bundle exec fastlane android appcenter
scripts.deploy:and:beta: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=beta ENVFILE=.env.beta APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-Beta-1 bundle exec fastlane android appcenter
scripts.deploy:and:production: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=production ENVFILE=.env.production APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-1 bundle exec fastlane android store
scripts.deploy:ios:alpha: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=alpha ENVFILE=.env.alpha APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-Alpha bundle exec fastlane ios appcenter
scripts.deploy:ios:beta: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=beta ENVFILE=.env.beta APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate-Beta bundle exec fastlane ios appcenter
scripts.deploy:ios:production: RN_RELEASE_TYPE=production ENVFILE=.env.production APPCENTER_APP_NAME=Mobile-Boilerplate bundle exec fastlane ios store
scripts.code-check: yarn solidarity && yarn lint && yarn prettier && yarn tsc && yarn test
